itemDescription: South African racewalker and marathon runner

wikipedia_page.main: Arthur St. Norman (20 October 1878 – 18 May 1956) was a South African long-distance runner. He competed in the marathon and the 10km walk at the 1912 Summer Olympics.

link_mentions.page: South Africa at the 1912 Summer Olympics
